ingredients.ingredient: 1 (12 ounce) jar roasted red bell peppers

cookingTips: Line pan with plastic wrap for easy unmolding after chilling
Layer in order: cream cheese, pesto, peppers, repeating for visual effect
Refrigerate at least 4 hours or overnight for clean layers when sliced
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How would you plate and serve this torta to showcase its beautiful layers and impressive presentation?
